title: Is it okay to use writing services for my assignment? - Quora

response.answer_text: You shouldn’t. Ever. It’s cheating and its unethical and if you’re doing it for school, you need to be caught and punished for your laziness. If I were your teacher or professor and I found out you used a writing service of any kind, I would fail you on the spot.

“Why should I hire an online assignment writing company?” You have more money than good sense. I cannot imagine any good reason to hire someone to write an assignment for you. It’s unethical, uneducational, in many cases illegal, and just such a bad idea. However, I can think of many good reasons to hire a writing coach or editor who can provide guidance and feedback on your own work so you can improve your own communication skills.
